recent.title: From C++ to Cross-Platform: The Fascinating Evolution of C# and .NET
recent.excerpt: Ever wonder why C# feels so polished right out of the gate? Let's explore how Anders Hejlsberg's experience with Delphi and TypeScript shaped C#'s DNA, and how .NET evolved from Windows-only to truly cross-platform.

recent.title: C# Records: When Classes Meet Functional Programming
recent.excerpt: Records in C# bring the best of object-oriented and functional worlds together. Let's explore how they make data modeling both cleaner and safer.
